name: Pocketweb Ltd
description:
Pocketweb was founded in 2008 by experienced developers and market experts in order to jointly create future mobile services together with customers from different industries.
Since the early days of smartphones, we have expected the highest quality when it comes to our developers. Our developers specialize in mobile development for iOS, Android, Facebook and HTML5 as well as Java/Scala, Unix/Linux server, IT-architecture and APIs/backend integration.
